Item.211001.3:
Standing in the wilderness, a gentle breeze caresses.
Another day blooms anew.
Item.211002.3:
A golden sea, brimming with the joy of harvest.
Make sure to eat well and take care of yourself!
Item.211003.3:
A tiny broom soaring with grand dreams.
The cloud-hidden scenery awaits tomorrow's discovery.
Item.211004.3:
A princess revered by all, a hero returning with honors.
Dreams are blind to status; your harvest grows with every step you take.
Item.211005.3:
The sand sea engulfs the horizon, obscuring the journey's end.
It's time to pause and catch your breath.
Item.211006.3:
A sparkling spring kisses your skirt hem, stopping you in your tracks.
Quench your thirst first, then brace yourself for the thorny path ahead.
Item.211007.3:
Shimmering stars light up the night sky.
Brave maidens, it's time to embark on your journey!
Item.211008.3:
Gentle starlight, farewell to today.
The bell rings to close today's business!
Item.212001.3:
I can't wait!
I'm desperate to savor my favorite iced black tea, sweetened with sugar, topped with creamy foam, infused with tangerine slices, sprinkled with chocolate crumbs, and blended with pineapple and mango juice!
Item.212002.3:
Spinning around in circles, vying for the chairs.
Only those who grab a chair get to sit down.
Wait, aren't we playing "Freeze Dance"?
Item.212003.3:
To Whom It May Concern,
With admiration for your outstanding dance skills,
you are warmly invited to this never-ending dance party.
Item.212005.3:
Pump up the jam, and keep the dance floor thumpin'!
Let the volume shatter the skies, let our passion ignite the clouds!
My adrenaline has skyrocketed to its absolute limit!
Item.212006.3:
At the dawn of creation,
shattered beliefs hovered above the horizon, casting its glow over the world.
Humans leaped over mountains, gazing boldly at the gods.
And then, heaven and earth split, the light dimmed, and days merged into an endless flow.
Item.212007.3:
The wind awakens all creatures and paints the forest with a splash of vibrant colors, whispering the news of the party to every corner of the woods and caves:
The grand celebration of the forest and its elves is about to begin!
Item.212008.3:
Keep the joyful moments for yourself.
Embrace it as a break—immerse yourself in this refreshing, fleeting joy.
Item.212009.3:
Its grudge still rages within, burning fiercely.
"——! ——————!!"
Alas, it's hard to comprehend its sorrowful cries.
Item.212010.3:
Once the war horn sounds, there's no going back.
Fight! Fight until the bitter end!
Item.213003.3:
On the stage enveloped by cheers, they shine brightly as they play their final melody.
The tumultuous emotions ignite the notes, consuming this night with fiery passion.
Item.213005.3:
Bammm! The cells are splitting!
Gurgleee! The brains are boiling!
Sliced right from the top,
one me multiplies into a thousand—how do you find the true me?
Item.213006.3:
Sinking into the cozy embrace of my soft bed, I find myself utterly unwilling to stir.
If we drift off together, will our dreams intertwine?
Item.213007.3:
Golden birds flap their wings, splitting the dreamscape as soft as clouds.
In the cracks where memories weave, we will eventually meet the ones we long to see.
Item.213008.3: The scenery along the journey is a gift we should appreciate. Let's take it slow, bring some snacks, and enjoy this bright, sunny break—it'll surely add a joyful chapter to our memories.
Item.213009.3: Warm raindrops trickle down from head to toe, sliding down every inch of my skin. Ah—choo! It's not a cold, just the soap bubbles tickling me again.
Item.213010.3:
The whirling harbor breeze,
The hot air from the steaming baskets...
As you lean in close, your breath merges with.
The neon-hued vapors, blurring my vision.
Item.213011.3: Beyond the veil of silence and solemnity, is there another side of you that I haven't yet discovered? Electronic-distorted notes peel away the mundane facade, revealing a tender gaze under the neon glow that beckons me toward you.
Item.213012.3:
With the earth as our stage and the starry sky as our backdrop,
Listen up, universe—this is our moment to shine!
Item.213013.3:
Dart through fields of wheat and play in maple forests, pausing where the seasons meet.
Oh, sun-kissed child, hide away, before the pains of growing up can find you.
Item.213014.3:
Tighten the screws, apply the grease.
Behind every great knight is an even greater blacksmith.
Safe travels—and don't ride too fast!
Item.213015.3:
I smile often, yet true happiness is a rare guest.
For that scent, once vibrant, now fades and drifts further away.
Yet, whenever I reach for it, there's a stinging pain in my heart...
Item.213016.3:
You've tasted the sweet forbidden fruit,
now you're the goddess of art.
Stand as the sole, ever-blooming rose in this pond of love and desire.
Sing, dance, shine, and repeat.
Keep going till the strings break, never stop.
Item.213017.3:
Summer wraps up in a blur of sweat, yet there's still time to touch up for the next show.
In the corner of a winter celebration, I score the last ice cream cone before closing.
No matter how life is divided between work and leisure,
I'm still me, whole and unchanged.
Item.213018.3:
On this eagerly anticipated day,
Standing before the dazzling shelves,
Which beverage holds the most anticipated flavor?
If you're torn between decisions,
Then take them all with you!
Item.213019.3:
Shimmering like fragile bubbles, they are dreams woven from pure imagination.
As these dreams burst and their shimmer fades, they uncover the purest truth,
whispering it all in silence.
Item.213020.3:
The moment wood splinters flew, a ravenous hunger burst through the door.
"No—get away from my emergency food stash! Aaaaah!"
Item.213021.3:
Mirrors never tell lies;
they beckon you in and bid you farewell.
Your fate is inscribed on a particle of drifting dust,
while divine prophecy mirrors itself in my gaze.
Item.213022.3:
Here lies the gateway to the Inferno.
It leads straight to the abyss of sin.
I wait by the riverbank, illuminating your sorrowful journey ahead,
blessing you to plunge into my eternal love.
Item.213023.3:
You skillfully push open the door,
And her pristine wings bring solace to your aching heart.
Together, you share a serene silence, a peaceful bond just between the two of you.
You know that her silence is her ultimate compassion towards you.
And your visit is the sole redemption she can ever hope for.
Item.213024.3:
"Hey, regular! Good to see ya! Your usual?"
"Huh? This seat's for toddlers only?"
"Eh, rules are made to be broken, right? Nobody's watching anyway!"
"Zoning out is adult paradise!"

Perfect vacation goals right here!
Resting on the register, she savors a dream, tart and sweet.
Item.213025.3:
O little bunny,
close your eyes and drift to sleep,
I'll cradle you in the arms of the night;

O little bunny,
rest your head and dream sweetly,
I promise you the sweetest treat of all.
Item.213026.3:
"La-la-la—welcome home, Master! ♥"
"Whether it's the weariness in your heart or the misfortune at your side,"
"I will personally help you sweep all that nasty trash away!"
"Let me turn my energy into your magic! ♥"
"Heaven's cutest maid, Beatrixa, at your service! ♥"

With a clear, lively voice and an impossibly cute demeanor,
she gave her all every day
to deliver healing and hope to her fans across the Nova Continent.
Item.214001.3:
Humans are born alone.
Only in the heat of battle do we truly feel alive.
Huh? Cool guys don't look at explosions? Fine, I heard you—
Item.214002.3:
Like flower petals, your departing form dissolves,
Beneath starlit nights, our vows still warm my palm,
These perfumed days bring thoughts of you, despite my own will.
Item.214005.3:
The blossoms drift in rainy haze,
That flowered in bright sunny days.
A rainbow's gleam within my hand—
Could such beauty ever stay?
Item.214006.3:
The witch stands proud, head held high,
Granting honey, venom, and love divine.
You who failed to choose your princess right,
Embrace this cruel pleasure, and dance with me tonight?
Item.214007.3:
They set the rules of right and wrong,
but if you loathe these bindings, rise as a midnight knight.
Even if bloodied and broken, we're staying true to who we are!
To those arrogant jerks:
"See this mighty fist?"
"After the clock strikes twelve, this is our domain!"
Item.214009.3:
Only one day of food left. Our wallets are empty. The Oasis's Grace is running low...
We've staked everything on this Monolith commission...
—Still, when it's time for the group photo, don't forget to smile!
Item.214010.3:
We beseech Thee, have mercy; heed our plea.
Goddess, do the cries of mortals reach Thine ears?
...
—Each word finds Me, finds Us all.
We shall guide humanity towards its glorious destiny.
Item.214011.3:
Before looking back at the start, what seemed the end was just
the start of a new chapter.
Are you happy as you've always dreamed you'd be?
Let's meet again tomorrow.
Item.214012.3:
On United Harvest's grand design, Philae stands as just a single point.
From here, I shall draw a perfect circle, claiming the entire Nova.
—Follow me. Pledge loyalty. March ever onward.
Item.214013.3:
"First, we need a ship, then courage, and lastly, faith."
The adventurer pinned the map
While whitecaps rage from point to point
Wild waters crash and beckon towards mysteries
She waits for kindred souls to sail.
Item.214014.3: We trekked, picked, and laughed with our friends, sharing sweet fruit that burst with juice in our mouths.
Item.214017.3:
Like a human life, fireworks bloom, flourish, and fade—
brief yet brilliant, leaving their unique mark across the night sky.
It's much like a Trekker's endless quest to climb the Monolith,
all for that one day when they might finally hold the stars in their hands...
Item.214018.3:
With guilt my heart was heavy worn, to heal the bridge that had been torn.
Thought friendship's door was closed for good,
Till here we sit, just as we should.
New décor graces these old walls, new packages the sweet food calls.
One drink runs hot, one drink runs cold,
Same taste remains from days of old.
Item.214019.3:
Kasimira, are you ready?
This is round 37 and our final match for today.

Too bad, just one shot shy.
If that shot had landed, you'd have had me beat.
Chaton, your hand wavered at the critical moment.

Just the thought of besting you gets my adrenaline pumping!
Let's do it again!

Rack the gun, we've got the next commission to prep for.

—Looks like Chaton's challenge isn't over yet.
Item.214020.3:
"Uneventful days aren't worth recording."
"Dull little things aren't worth recording."
"Repetitive work isn't worth recording."
But...are they truly worthless?
A teammate's reminder before you head out, the wrong turn you took, the smiles and thanks you received...
These ordinary fragments of memory condense into tiny points of light.
Even if the paper turns yellow with time, the brilliance of each day will never be forgotten.
Item.214021.3:
Friends, companions...whatever the name, they all embody the same group of souls united by fate. They converge when the threads of fate intertwine, and disperse when they unwind.
What we can do is cherish every fleeting moment of this reunion, laughing and playing with all our hearts, and etching those precious memories deep into our hearts.
And as the hour of parting draws near, we cling to the hope of a future encounter, anticipating the day we shall meet again.
Item.214022.3:
Behold, something looms in the dark.
Listen closely, do you hear those footsteps echoing?
Odd, a sudden shiver runs down my spine.

A faulty projector, an unknown film reel, and eerie visuals flickering...
A Trekker's camp at midnight, an uninvited guest, and an unexpected visitor.
"Meow—"
The silence envelops all. You close the door, but it has already slipped inside.
Item.214023.3:
We had to take a day off now and then.
Escape the gang fights and the daily grind,
step out under a clear sky, and spray paint a rainbow of our own across it.
Item.214026.3:
Damp hair clung to her back.
Her clothes were a mess, yet the air was stiflingly still.
Carrying a heavy heart, even the falling petals seemed to weigh her down.
As the rain fell endlessly, your silhouette began to blur.
Item.214027.3:
Brush and ink are her weapons.
On the stretched rice paper,
She weaves her magic, each brushstroke dancing in unconventional places.
This is her realm, a world of enchantment solely under her command.
Item.214028.3:
A petal without a name or number
drifts into the silent garden,
carrying a blush of crimson and a vision of pure white,
settling into a golden specimen, alongside a vanished dream.
Item.214030.3:
The girl burst in with the afternoon sun,
bringing with her the aroma of snacks.
Fries? Grilled fish? Or a loaf of fluffy, warm bread?
You had to grab something
to enjoy this stolen moment of peace.
Item.214031.1: The Clash of Blade and Axe
Item.214031.3:
An alarm blared as blade met axe.
The cage shattered, and she plunged into the abyss.
Through the crimson rain, she met your eyes.
Item.214032.3:
Facts captured.
Photos printed.
Story broadcast.
Welcome to the witches' Dream Factory of ☆Truth!
Item.214033.3:
Ah, welcome to my ball, my dear patient.
Listen, the music is playing. Come, dance with my collection among these phantom bubbles.
Item.214036.3:
Body bound, soul eroded,
even pain masquerades as a mire of salvation.
The fallen priestess still wanders
on a pilgrimage with no answers and no end,
awaiting a righteous one to grant her release.
Item.214037.3:
The children of the Ash District tell a legend:
when despair grips the world and tears loved ones apart,
a green-haired heroine called the "Lord of the Prize Claw" and her brave companions
will lead everyone to catch the last glimmer of hope and reunite with their families.
Item.214038.3:
Floating on a thousand crests,
a translucent, shimmering thing.
Escaping the searing summer heat,
drifting along with the migrating fish.
Item.214039.3:
I long for the sea breeze to linger, for the waves to remain.
I pray for the sunset to stretch endlessly, for the starlight to never fade.
I wish to share with you alone—a summer that belongs to us.
Item.214040.3:
To protect your companions, to summon the courage and become your best self,
strike your fist at the colossal enemy,
and clear the path to a future full of hope.
Item.21997.2: Grants a random basic material for Disc tier-up.
Item.22.2: A proof of your activity in the Startup Grant. Used to level up the Grant Tier.
Item.22.3: As you explore the Monolith and beyond, the Startup Grant will amplify your progress, making every step count double.
Item.221001.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.221001.3: Standing in the wilderness, a gentle breeze caresses.Another day blooms anew.
Item.221002.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.221002.3: A golden sea, brimming with the joy of harvest.Make sure to eat well and take care of yourself!
Item.221003.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.221003.3: A tiny broom soaring with grand dreams.The cloud-hidden scenery awaits tomorrow's discovery.
Item.221004.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.221004.3: A princess revered by all, a hero returning with honors.Dreams are blind to status; your harvest grows with every step you take.
Item.221005.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.221005.3: The sand sea engulfs the horizon, obscuring the journey's end.It's time to pause and catch your breath.
Item.221006.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.221006.3: A sparkling spring kisses your skirt hem, stopping you in your tracks.Quench your thirst first, then brace yourself for the thorny path ahead.
Item.221007.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.221007.3: Shimmering stars light up the night sky.Brave maidens, it's time to embark on your journey!
Item.221008.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.221008.3: Gentle starlight, farewell to today.The bell rings to close today's business!
Item.222001.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222001.3: I can't wait!I'm desperate to savor my favorite iced black tea, sweetened with sugar, topped with creamy foam, infused with tangerine slices, sprinkled with chocolate crumbs, and blended with pineapple and mango juice!
Item.222002.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222002.3: Spinning around in circles, vying for the chairs.Only those who grab a chair get to sit down.Wait, aren't we playing "Freeze Dance"?
Item.222003.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222003.3: To Whom It May Concern,With admiration for your outstanding dance skills,you are warmly invited to this never-ending dance party.
Item.222005.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222005.3: Pump up the jam, and keep the dance floor thumpin'!Let the volume shatter the skies, let our passion ignite the clouds!My adrenaline has skyrocketed to its absolute limit!
Item.222006.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222006.3: At the dawn of creation,shattered beliefs hovered above the horizon, casting its glow over the world.Humans leaped over mountains, gazing boldly at the gods.And then, heaven and earth split, the light dimmed, and days merged into an endless flow.
Item.222007.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222007.3: The wind awakens all creatures and paints the forest with a splash of vibrant colors, whispering the news of the party to every corner of the woods and caves:The grand celebration of the forest and its elves is about to begin!
Item.222008.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222008.3: Keep the joyful moments for yourself.Embrace it as a break—immerse yourself in this refreshing, fleeting joy.
Item.222009.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222009.3: Its grudge still rages within, burning fiercely."——! ——————!!"Alas, it's hard to comprehend its sorrowful cries.
Item.222010.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.222010.3: Once the war horn sounds, there's no going back.Fight! Fight until the bitter end!
Item.223003.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.223003.3: On the stage enveloped by cheers, they shine brightly as they play their final melody.The tumultuous emotions ignite the notes, consuming this night with fiery passion.
Item.223004.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.223004.3: The charming and elegant Ashwind Twin Moons;the wise and witty protagonist.Black holes loom, foreshadowing a dark tomorrow for you all!
Item.223005.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.223005.3: Bammm! The cells are splitting!Gurgleee! The brains are boiling!Sliced right from the top,one me multiplies into a thousand—how do you find the true me?
Item.223006.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.223006.3: Sinking into the cozy embrace of my soft bed, I find myself utterly unwilling to stir.If we drift off together, will our dreams intertwine?
Item.223007.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.

Item.224027.3: Brush and ink are her weapons.On the stretched rice paper,She weaves her magic, each brushstroke dancing in unconventional places.This is her realm, a world of enchantment solely under her command.
Item.224028.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224028.3: A petal without a name or numberdrifts into the silent garden,carrying a blush of crimson and a vision of pure white,settling into a golden specimen, alongside a vanished dream.
Item.224030.1: A Moment in the Afternoon Melody
Item.224030.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224030.3: The girl burst in with the afternoon sun,bringing with her the aroma of snacks.Fries? Grilled fish? Or a loaf of fluffy, warm bread?You had to grab somethingto enjoy this stolen moment of peace.
Item.224031.1: The Clash of Blade and Axe Melody
Item.224031.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224031.3: An alarm blared as blade met axe.The cage shattered, and she plunged into the abyss.Through the crimson rain, she met your eyes.
Item.224032.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224032.3: Facts captured.Photos printed.Story broadcast.Welcome to the witches' Truth ☆ Dream Factory!
Item.224033.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224033.3: Ah, welcome to my ball, my dear patient.Listen, the music is playing. Come, dance with my collection among these phantom bubbles.
Item.224036.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224036.3: Body bound, soul eroded,even pain masquerades as a mire of salvation.The fallen priestess still wanderson a pilgrimage with no answers and no end,awaiting a righteous one to grant her release.
Item.224037.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224037.3: The children of the Ash District tell a legend:when despair grips the world and tears loved ones apart,a green-haired heroine called the "Lord of the Prize Claw" and her brave companionswill lead everyone to catch the last glimmer of hope and reunite with their families.
Item.224038.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224038.3: Floating on a thousand crests,a translucent, shimmering thing.Escaping the searing summer heat,drifting along with the migrating fish.
Item.224039.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224039.3: I long for the sea breeze to linger, for the waves to remain.I pray for the sunset to stretch endlessly, for the starlight to never fade.I wish to share with you alone—a summer that belongs to us.
Item.224040.2: Material required for the Crescendo of specific Discs.
Item.224040.3: To protect your companions, to summon the courage and become your best self,strike your fist at the colossal enemy,and clear the path to a future full of hope.
Item.23.2: A certificate obtained through recruiting Trekkers. Can be exchanged for items in the Shop.
Item.23.3: A testament to every distant voyage,where each stack's thickness whispers tales of delightful encounters.
Item.24.2: A certificate obtained through recruiting Trekkers. Can be exchanged for rare items in the Shop.
Item.24.3: A testament to extraordinary journeys,where each miracle represents relentless pursuit.
Item.25.2: A certificate earned in Trekker Duel. Can be exchanged for items in the Duel Shop.
Item.25.3: Bestowed by the Trekker Association, it's a testament to your prowess in Trekker Duel.Rumor has it that it can unlock hidden options in the Shop.
Item.28.2: A certificate used for unlocking Proving Grounds.
Item.28.3: A hunting bounty posted by the Trekker Association.Be sure to gauge your strength before taking on the hunt.
Item.29.2: A pass used to initiate a Monolith Express.
Item.29.3: Once you have obtained the "Key to the Monolith Stairs," you can use the pass to go straight to the top and snag the ultimate "Record"... Yeah, like luck ever works that way.You still have to face every single twist and turn. This just saves you a bit of the boring slog.
Item.3.2: An extremely rare crystal of immense value.
Item.3.3: A condensed mass imbued with the power of Stellnanite Vein, both hard and clear.For centuries, it has been revered as the material for crafting Soul Stones, carrying immense value.
Item.30.2: A pass used to initiate a Monolith Express.
Item.30.3: Once you have obtained the "Key to the Monolith Stairs," you can use the pass to go straight to the top and snag the ultimate "Record"... Yeah, like luck ever works that way.You still have to face every single twist and turn. This just saves you a bit of the boring slog.
Item.30001.2: Grants a small amount of EXP for leveling up Trekkers.
Item.30001.3: A beginner's guide tailored for novice Trekkers.Even though it's just a few pages long, reading it will always be beneficial.
Item.30002.2: Grants a moderate amount of EXP for leveling up Trekkers.
Item.30002.3: A journal filled with handy tips for Trekkers.Read through a couple, and you'll avoid making mistakes your seniors made.
Item.30003.2: Grants a large amount of EXP for leveling up Trekkers.
Item.30003.3: Each page is packed with reflections and lessons learned.Its weight signifies not only the memories of the journey, but also the wisdom accumulated.
Item.30004.2: Grants tons of EXP for leveling up Trekkers.
Item.30004.3: Absorbing knowledge without comprehension is futile; even the finest books deserve repeated perusals.A true Trekker has every line of their books etched in their memory.
Item.31.2: A medal obtained through Cataclysm Survivor. Can be exchanged for items in the Shop.
Item.31.3: A medal awarded to Trekkers who actively fight in the defense front.With enough badges, you can exchange them at the Association for generous rewards.—Perhaps this is the kind of currency that truly holds weight in a Trekker's circles.
Item.31002.2: Upgrades high-level skills of any Trekker.
Item.31002.3: A testament to your victory over a mysterious and powerful boss."Exactly! If you don't work hard, how can I enjoy this fine wine?"
Item.31007.3: Proof of having defeated a mysterious and powerful boss."You've got to be kidding me. I bet this belongs to someone else!"
Item.32000.2: A generic material used for Trekker skill upgrades.
Item.32000.3: For Trekkers, wisdom, skill and experience are more important than strength and magic.—One can always learn something by playing chess with the more experienced.
Item.32001.2: A basic material used for Trekker skill upgrades.
Item.32001.3: Tap the buttons to the rhythm of the music—a game anyone can pick up. It's a fun and effortless way to improve one's coordination, making it a hit among Trekkers.
Item.32002.2: An intermediate material used for Trekker skill upgrades.
Item.32002.3: Step up your game with this challenging hardcore rhythm game. Most people struggle to keep up with so many notes.But, true virtuosos glide through with seamless elegance.
Item.32003.2: An advanced material used for Trekker ability upgrades.
Item.32003.3: Enter the realm of "Boss's Tune," a music game series that pushes the limits. Only those with lightning-fast reflexes or perhaps an extra pair of hands dare to take up the challenge. Could this be the next step in human evolution?!
Item.32011.2: A basic material used for Trekker skill upgrades.
Item.32011.3: Dodge bullets and blast your enemies to smithereens. This game features simple rules, but it significantly sharpens your reflexes.Trekkers often joke about these games, calling them "Little Butterflies."
Item.32012.2: An intermediate material used for Trekker skill upgrades.
Item.32012.3: As the saying goes, "A little goes a long way," and "Barrage" is a testament to this. It evolves its gameplay purely through escalating difficulty. While ordinary players are still struggling for "survival," geniuses are already shooting for "high scores."
Item.32013.2: An advanced material used for Trekker ability upgrades.
Item.32013.3: For all those previous shooter games, Trekkers would always boast, "It's nothing special..." But then "Demon Bee" showed up.Oh boy, is it a beast! Not a single soul has managed to clear the game without using continues or losing a life.Could this be the ultimate test of skill?
Item.32021.2: A basic material used for Trekker skill upgrades.
Item.32021.3: Punch! Kick! Rising Dragon Strike! Knock your enemies off the stage!This Kung Fu game serves as both a battleground for Trekkers to hone their combat skills and a fantastic outlet for stress relief.
Item.32022.2: An intermediate material used for Trekker skill upgrades.
Item.32022.3: To the masters, "fighting" is the "art of outflanking." In other words, patience often leads to victory—cultivating this hunter's mindset is crucial for protecting Trekkers.
Item.32023.2: An advanced material used for Trekker ability upgrades.
Item.32023.3: Mindless attacks won't secure a win. Take the game "Phantom" as an example; there's an opponent who can seamlessly block 15 punches in the blink of an eye.If you can break through his defense, your combat skills will truly be unparalleled.
Item.33001.2: Used to craft random common gifts in Material Crafting.
Item.33001.3: Each time a Monolith is explored, Wishing Eggs will appear along with Wishing Boxes and can be used to wish for common Artifacts.In addition to selling Artifacts to the people of the cities for money, Trekkers sometimes save some "leftovers" for themselves.
Item.33011.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 150.
Item.33011.3: A marvelous Artifact that ignites with just a flick. It's a truly handy tool for Trekkers journeying through the Wilds.Strictly prohibited in dense forests!
Item.33012.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 500.
Item.33012.3: Equipped with directional nozzles, this Artifact boasts enhanced capacity and firepower, making it perfect for heating food.Even in the Wilds, you can whip up delicious grilled meat patties that taste just like mom's!
Item.33013.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 2,000.
Item.33013.3: With super-charged firepower and capacity, it can even serve as a weapon to fend off wild beasts.Be warned, it's banned from all forms of transportation in Nova's cities due to its hazardous nature. Yet, it remains a highly sought-after treasure among Trekkers, chefs, and acrobats!
Item.33021.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 150.
Item.33021.3: The unveiling of camera Artifact marks another groundbreaking moment in the arts and media landscape.Some believe capturing a photo steals a part of one's soul, making it a niche hobby.
Item.33022.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 500.
Item.33022.3: When the Reflective Photo Capturer first emerged, painters cried foul, fearing job loss. But soon, some embraced the change, adopting the title of "Photographist" and carving out a new field.
Item.33023.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 2,000.
Item.33023.3: The ultimate dream Artifact for Photographists.With this, you can capture any fleeting moment from afar, preserving it forever on film...Still, maybe it's this fleeting nature that gives life its meaning.
Item.33031.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 150.
Item.33031.3: One of the most popular daily Artifacts in the Shop, and a must-have for many female Trekkers.Before this handy device, Novians would rely on magical spells or simply sitting in warm places to dry their wet hair.
Item.33032.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 500.
Item.33032.3: An upgraded hair dryer with precise temperature and speed settings, minimizing hair damage.Just like savoring a glass of fine red wine after a gourmet meal, using this after a refreshing bath takes your relaxation to the next level.
Item.33033.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 2,000.
Item.33033.3: An extremely expensive daily Artifact, exclusive to the boudoirs of aristocrats and legendary stars.Though boasting powerful functions, the owners often prefer to flaunt it as a status symbol rather than putting it to actual use.
Item.33041.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 150.
Item.33041.3: A simple blowing device, compact and easy to carry, but don't expect too much when it comes to its cooling effect.
Item.33042.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 500.
Item.33042.3: A cooling artifact that really makes a splash, but its size and weight make it less portable.However, it's a potent weapon against the heat and irritability.
Item.33043.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 2,000.
Item.33043.3: An Artifact that is hailed as the ultimate savior against scorching heat,It not only rescues any Novian from the deadly grip of blazing summers but also boasts a pivoting function, spreading its benevolent coolness far and wide.
Item.33051.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 150.
Item.33051.3: Push the button, and it'll radiate a warm, inspiring burst of colored light. Perfect for live performances to ignite the atmosphere!You're my top pick!
Item.33052.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 500.
Item.33052.3: Even though not a superstar yet, this raw gem already shines so brightly... Is this what it feels like to grow together?—You over there, and you over here—I see you all!
Item.33053.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 2,000.
Item.33053.3: Even if you've become a megastar, I'll be in the stands, waving the glow stick for you with all my heart once more!In the instant our eyes meet, that's when magic happens.
Item.33061.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 150.
Item.33061.3: It's said that placing it beside your bed will summon stars to your dreams.Did these twinkles traverse the night sky just for us?
Item.33062.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 500.
Item.33062.3: Display a moon at home to keep you company.This mysterious ruler of the night, whose secrets have remained hidden for millennia,Is both the mirror of the day and a reflection of our souls.
Item.33063.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 2,000.
Item.33063.3: Scholars have yet to fathom the universe,So the Starry Tyrant grants wisdom from beyond this world,Crystallizing truth into tangible shapes.
Item.33071.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 150.
Item.33071.3: Escape the scorching heat of summer with a delightful bowl of refreshing crushed ice!
Item.33072.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 500.
Item.33072.3: Wandering the streets on a lazy afternoon, I passed by an ice cream shop with inviting chill, dreaming of sharing a sweet treat with you on my next visit.
Item.33073.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 2,000.
Item.33073.3: I've finally asked you out. The "Buy One, Get One Half Off" deal was just my excuse.My favorite flavor? Same as yours!
Item.33081.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 150.
Item.33081.3: This uniquely shaped tea bowl is said to attract purring mystical beasts when placed at your doorstep. The more delicious the food inside, the more cracks will appear on its surface—greedy beasts often knock it over in their haste.
Item.33082.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 500.
Item.33082.3: A treasured heirloom passed down through generations, delicately crafted with intricate designs of azure blossoms on its pristine white glaze. Whenever esteemed guests visit, the enthusiastic Loong retrieves it from the wooden cabinet to brew a cup of warm tea.
Item.33083.2: A gift that increases a Trekker's Affinity by 2,000.
Item.33083.3: This kettle pulses with enigmatic energy. It looks like It's made of glass, but It's actually crafted from a special material, making it robust enough to withstand any harsh environment. Whether it holds a life-saving antidote or a mesmerizing poison is entirely up to the whim of its maker.
Item.33901.2: Grants a common gift of your choice.
Item.33901.3: Wanna give a little surprise to your closest companion? Pick one from these lightweight and practical artifacts—they're perfect gifts for Trekkers!
Item.33902.2: Grants an exquisite gift of your choice.
Item.33902.3: How to express your heartfelt gratitude and blessings? Pick an elegant and exquisite artifact here as a symbol of your unspoken bond!
Item.33903.2: Grants a deluxe gift of your choice.
Item.33903.3: What kind of gift can truly last forever and be cherished for generations? Pick a luxurious gift that captures your heart, and let it serve as the perfect testament to your friendship...or deeper sentiments!
